titleStmt.title: A Sad and terrible relation of two dreadful earth-quakes the one happening in England ... on the 8th of September, and the other at Jamaco, in the West-Indies, on the 7th of July, 1692, with their dreadful effects ...

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for P. Brooksby, J. Deacon, J. Blare, and J. Back,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
